whitelist_title.message: Urls added to white-list will be clickable

whitelist_description.message: Any link that will be added to the white-list will be clickable. Empty or * will enable all. Multiple urls are space separated. Wildcards are allowed e.g. *.trello.com

enableExecutables_title.message: Enable links to local executable files
enableExecutables_title.description: Enable links to exe. files setting

enableExecutables_description.message: If enabled any progam file can be launched by the addon. (Attention! A malicious site could use this for denial-of-service attack!)
enableExecutables_description.description: Enable links to exe. files settings description

enableLinkIcons_description.message: If checked there will be a link added to every local link

revealOpenOption_title.description: Default link text click behaviour setting

revealOpenOption_description.message: Changes the default click behaviour of file-links. Default = direct file link open.
